    • AbstractUser

      public AbstractUser​(java.lang.String name, School school, Gender gender, Nationality nationality, UserType userType) throws PasswordStorage.CannotPerformOperationException
      Creates user containing specific information.
      Parameters:
      name - A String that represents user name
      school - An Enum value of the user's school
      gender - An Enum value of the user's gender
      nationality - An Enum value of the user's nationality
      userType - An Enum value of user's type
      Throws:
      PasswordStorage.CannotPerformOperationException - unsafe to hash password
      See Also:
      School, Gender, Nationality, UserType
